question: What does a rolling plan refer to?
option3: Changes both allocation and target every year
option4: Dont change target but change allocation
answer: Changes both allocation and target every year
explanation: Rolling plan can be defined as the plan where there is no fixation of dates in respect of commencement and end of the plan. The meaning of the Rolling Plan was that now, every year the performance of the plan will be assessed and a new plan will be made next year based upon this assessment.
